tool.name: Ligand
tool.description: : This class is a wrapper for downloading a PDB ligand from the Protein Data Bank.
tool.command:
#if $config.sele == "option1": ln -s -f ${config.properties} ${config.properties}_`echo $$`.${config.properties.ext}; #end if
ligand
#if $config.sele == "option1": --config ${config.properties}.${config.properties.ext} #else if $config.sele == "option2": --config '${config.jsonstr}' #else if $config.sele == "option3": --config '__oc____dq__ligand_code__dq__:__dq__${properties.ligand_code}__dq__,__dq__api_id__dq__:__dq__${properties.api_id}__dq____cc__' #end if
--output_pdb_path $outname_output_pdb_path ; #if $config.sele == "option1": rm -f ${config.properties}_`echo $$`.${config.properties.ext}; #end if
if test -f $outname_output_pdb_path; then mv $outname_output_pdb_path $output_pdb_path; fi;

param.name: outname_output_pdb_path
param.label: output PDB name
param.help: Path to the output PDB ligand file Format: [output].pdb

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: api_id
param.label: api_id
param.help: Identifier of the PDB REST API from which the PDB structure will be downloaded.
param.option: pdbe - PDB in Europe REST API
